pages.title: Home
pages.content:
Welcome to my portfolio!

I'm a full-stack developer passionate about building clean, efficient applications. This site demonstrates how Genes Framework can work entirely without a database - all content is loaded from this config.json file.

Check out my projects below and explore the other pages to learn more about me and my work.

pages.title: About Me
pages.content:
Hi! I'm a developer who loves working with lightweight frameworks and elegant solutions.

I specialize in:
- PHP & JavaScript development
- Database design & optimization
- API development
- Multi-tenant architectures

I believe in writing clean, maintainable code that solves real problems. When I'm not coding, you can find me reading tech blogs, contributing to open source, or exploring new frameworks.

This portfolio is built with Genes Framework using only config.json as a data source - no database required!
